title: TKG Looking for members!
body:
TerraKnights Gaming (TKG) are ready to recruit! TKG aims to provide management and support for a group of skilled players to become a high performance team to take on all in the OCE scene, starting with the SumSoc open ladder as well as other organised team events.
We have a management team in place that will provide support, mediation as well as arranging coaching and analysis. What we need now are our stars!
We are recruiting for all positions with the immediate focus being a team captain who will then be involved in further recruitment process. This is a team with big ambition so we are looking for high ELO players ready to be part of a high performing team.
Are you our Captain? Please send an email to TerraKnightsGaming@gmail.com outlining your current rank and role, your primary pool, your team experience and tell us why you want to be a part of this project!
For any questions you can also contact us at Facebook.com/terraknightsgaming

replies.body: Pretty sure i saw someone in silver with this exact clan tag haha
